attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Nestled in the Ocean Park neighbourhood of South Surrey, Delitalia has been providing a taste of Italy to discerning customers for twenty years.
japanese food, sushi, asian, chinese food

Le Jardin serves coursed Chef Menus' which change weekly to ensure that you are getting fresh and local products, and a new and interesting dining experience each time you join us.
Lunch, served Monday through Friday, will feature three course meals with optional Wine Pairings.
Dinner, served Wednesday through Saturday, will feature 10 courses with options of choosing 6 or 8, also offered with optional Wine Pairings.
With it's quaint courtyard like ambiance, and knowledgeable service, Le Jardin is sure to become a quick favourite.

name: Ethical Addiction Apparel & Dudes Coffee House

attributes.about_this_biz_specialties: Our Chef has over 23 years of experience with 15 years of experience in South Surrey. We prepare our dishes with the finest ingredients and with a passion to bring the best taste to our customers. We look forward to serving our community by offering the best food and customer service.
Gorgeous beach views, sunsets, fish & chips, seafood, burgers, poutine, hand-cut fries!

The Cabin in Crescent Beach is South Surrey's newest upscale casual
restaurant.  The Pacific Northwest style cuisine features  fresh seafood,
"AAA" steaks, gourmet pastas and many gluten free options. Libations include signature cocktails, craft beers and award winning wines. Enjoy excellent food and service with a fun and friendly ambiance. Your home away from home.

attributes.about_this_biz_bio:
Many clients have been wondering where to find John Kavanagh after his Des Gitans days in New Westminister.

John joined Wolfie's at White Rock Beach as Chef in '96.

Two and a half years later he purchased Wolfie's, continued with his success and sold in '05 to become the new owner of Seahorse Grill in Crescent Beach!
attributes.about_this_biz_history:
Seahorse Grill is not concept dining and it's not a concept menu. It's a blend of international flavours, 29 years experience and enthusiasm, prepared and served in a casual "feels like home" atmosphere.

This friendly neighbourhood bistro, owned by John and Francina Kavanagh, will win a place in your heart ... a veritable treasure in your lifestyle at the beach.

Dedication to sheer passionate invention, from scratch! Fresh organic herbs, pulled from the garden that day, enhance dishes prepared by John that give a punch of flavour that speaks of real food.

John smokes his own feta and makes his own smooth, rich paté, among many other delicacies, offering a uniqueness to his menu rarely found.
attributes.about_this_biz_specialties:
Sumptuous pate... Crispy, house made taro chips... Garlic pesto goat cheese crostini's drizzled with infused oils. Sunday night prime rib is a standout event, with seafood, salads, pasta and pizzas rounding out this eclectic menu.

Near the beach, this bistro style restaurant offers intimate, outdoor dining during the warmer months and a fireplace indoors when the temperatures outside are cooler.

Open for Dinner six days a week 
- Closed Tuesdays -

Catering is available for Corporate Functions, Weddings etc.

Fresh - Real - Unscripted

What makes us different? 
Our special dough is proven to be easy to digest, naturally matured from 48 to 72 hours, making the crust, delicious, light, low in fat, healthy, soft and crispy. 
Our ingredients are always fresh.
We only use extra virgin olive oil 
Our gourmet square pizzas have authentic Italian products combined with local flavours elevating taste and quality, creating an absolute Italian delicacy that you'll love in every bite.
Nestled in the Ocean Park neighbourhood of South Surrey, Delitalia has been providing a taste of Italy to discerning customers for twenty years.
japanese food, sushi, asian, chinese food

The Sunflower Cafe has been providing our own unique meals and treats for residents and visitors of Crescent Beach for more than a decade.  We keep the menu simple, the quality superb and the prices within every family's budget.

Le Jardin serves coursed Chef Menus' which change weekly to ensure that you are getting fresh and local products, and a new and interesting dining experience each time you join us.
Lunch, served Monday through Friday, will feature three course meals with optional Wine Pairings.
Dinner, served Wednesday through Saturday, will feature 10 courses with options of choosing 6 or 8, also offered with optional Wine Pairings.
With it's quaint courtyard like ambiance, and knowledgeable service, Le Jardin is sure to become a quick favourite.
